articles.title: United Airlines flights in US briefly grounded by 'software update' - BBC
articles.description: The carrier says "a software update caused a widespread slowdown in United's technology systems".
articles.content:
United Airlines has resumed flights after briefly grounding all planes in the US on Tuesday because of a computer glitch.
The carrier said "a software update caused a widespread slowdown in United's… [+546 chars]
